topic.title: Glasgow Coma Score Organizer - conformance rules

lines.i: Collection of Glasgow Coma Score observations

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170"

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10313)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Eye (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.160)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10314)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Motor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.192)

MAY contain [0..*] component (CONF:10315)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Qualifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.159)

SHOULD contain [0..1] component (CONF:10316)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Total (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.158)

SHALL contain [1..1] component (CONF:10317)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Verbal (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.162)
